snippet: Evercore, which has won major advisory deals despite being smaller than many rivals, had a huge setback in 2011 - namely, the collapsed $39 billion takeover of T-Mobile USA by AT&T.
abstract: Evercore, which has won major advisory deals despite being smaller than many rivals, had a huge setback in 2011 - namely, the collapsed $39 billion takeover of T-Mobile USA by AT&T.
lead_paragraph: Even the collapse of a huge deal could not keep Evercore Partners from turning a profit.

headline.main: Despite Deal Setback, Evercore's Profit Jumps 29%
